00041 #include <stdio.h>
00042 #include "memvirtu.h"

00051 void MSD_execCamera(void)
00052 {
00053    char  name1[15];
00054    float f1 = 0.0, f2 = 0.0, f3 = 0.0, f4 = 0.0, f5 = 0.0, f6 = 0.0, f7 = 0.0;
00055    int   i1 = 0, i2 = 0, i3 = 0, i4 = 0;
00056    int   ip;
00057    char  opt;
00058 
00059    for (ip = 0; ip == 0;)
00060    {
00061       switch (opt = optin())
00062       {
00063           case 'g':
00064           if (12 == sscanf(restbuf, "%s %f %f %f %f %f %f %f %d %d %d %d",
00065                            name1, &f1, &f2, &f3, &f4, &f5, &f6, &f7,
00066                            &i1, &i2, &i3, &i4))
00067           {
00068              ip = 1;
00069           }
00070           break;
00071 
00072           case 'e':
00073           if (4 == sscanf(restbuf, "%s %f %f %f", name1, &f1, &f2, &f3))
00074           {
00075              ip = 1;
00076           }
00077           break;
00078 
00079           case 'r':
00080           if (4 == sscanf(restbuf, "%s %f %f %f", name1, &f4, &f5, &f6))
00081           {
00082              ip = 1;
00083           }
00084           break;
00085 
00086           case 's':
00087           if (2 == sscanf(restbuf, "%s %f", name1, &f7))
00088           {
00089              ip = 1;
00090           }
00091           break;
00092 
00093           case 'm':
00094           if (2 == sscanf(restbuf, "%s %d", name1, &i1))
00095           {
00096              ip = 1;
00097           }
00098           break;
00099 
00100           case 'h':
00101           if (2 == sscanf(restbuf, "%s %d", name1, &i2))
00102           {
00103              ip = 1;
00104           }
00105           break;
00106 
00107           case 'd':
00108           if (2 == sscanf(restbuf, "%s %d", name1, &i3))
00109           {
00110              ip = 1;
00111           }
00112           break;
00113 
00114           case 'f':
00115           if (2 == sscanf(restbuf, "%s %d", name1, &i4))
00116           {
00117              ip = 1;
00118           }
00119           break;
00120       }
00121       if (ip == 0)
00122       {
00123          printf("-g       Camera Olho Referencia Escala Modo Eliminicao Hashura Planas\n");
00124          printf("-ersmhdf Camera Olho/Referencia/Escala/Modo/Eliminacao/Hashura/Planas\n");
00125          if (!lineins("? "))
00126          {
00127             return;
00128          }
00129       }
00130    }
00131    if (opt == 'g')
00132    {
00133       MSD_highNameCreateCamera(name1, f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6, f7, i1,
00134                                i2, i3, i4);
00135    }
00136    else
00137    {
00138       MSD_highNameAlteraCamera(opt, name1, f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6,
00139                                f7, i1, i2, i3, i4);
00140    }
00141 }
